div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 158px; height: 1px; padding-top: 80px; margin-left: 48px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Stage 0:
Download LM, LibriSpeech, MUSAN data

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 138px; height: 1px; padding-top: 30px; margin-left: 248px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 308px; height: 1px; padding-top: 290px; margin-left: 269px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Inputs "data/lang_phone/lexicon.txt" consisting of words and tokens (i.e., phones) and does the following:
Add disambiguation symbols to the lexicon and generate lexicon_disambig.txt
Generate tokens.txt, the token table mapping a token to a unique integer.
Generate words.txt, the word table mapping a word to a unique integer.
Generate L.pt, in k2 format.
Generate L_disambig.pt, in k2 format.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 198px; height: 1px; padding-top: 690px; margin-left: 28px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: Stage 8: Convert downloaded arpa LMs to FST

div.div:
Prepare lang BPE
(lexicon.txt, lexicon_disambig.txt, L.pt, L_disambig.pt, tokens.txt)

div.div: Stage 7: Prepare bigram token-level P for MMI training

div.div: Convert transcript of words into tokens using lexicon

div.div: Train kenLM arpa (using transcript generated above)

(for RNN-T fast beam search decoding)
